fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Prepare Trap (Night): Gain a use of Place Trap.
- Place Trap (Night): Place your trap, which is fundamentally identical to a normal Trapper's trap, except that Unseen roles cannot trigger it. 0 uses.
- Deathly Trap (Night): Spend a use of Place Trap to place a trap which will kill anyone that triggers it, regardless of role. Unseen will not trigger these traps. 2 uses.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You may have multiple traps set up at once.
- You may not build and place a trap in the same night.
- However, you may place multiple traps in one night.
